entry.title: Recipe Book Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 6.00 - 13.50 (7 variants)

My great grandma, grandma, and mom are fabulous cooks. The only problem is they didn't always document the best recipes. You may not have this worry. If you buy this charm and send it off to your favorite chefs maybe they will take the hint and compile all of your favorite recipes.

entry.title: Grapes Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 6.00 - 13.50 (7 variants)

This bunch of grapes was hand drawn by Nancy Dreishpoon years ago. The drawing and model, helped to kick off the big "wine identifier" craze, that was so popular in the 90's. Now, who doesn't love wine? What's your favorite type? Mine is a cabernet sauvignon from France, sorry California.

entry.title: Cupcake Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 6.00 - 13.50 (7 variants)

Cupcake Charm. This yummy little charm has five pointed stars embossed on top of it's frosted top. Cupcake stores seem to be popping up all over the US and who doesn't love cupcakes. Buy this little charm for the cupcake lover in your life.

  • Sterling Silver Plated 100 Mils
  • Made in the U.S.A.
  • Three Dimensional
  • Designed by Nancy Dreishpoon
